hero.title: Well Connected and Comfortable Flats for Rent in Sector 105 Gurugram
description: Sector 105 Gurugram is a strategically located residential locality near the Dwarka Expressway, known for its planned development and smooth connectivity to Delhi and central Gurugram. Tenants searching for a flat for rent in Sector 105 Gurugram prefer this area due to its close proximity to the Delhiâ€“Gurugram border, IGI Airport, and major employment hubs across NCR. The sector offers a peaceful residential setting while keeping daily commuting efficient and time-saving.

Flats for rent in Sector 105 Gurugram are available in modern residential societies and builder floors designed with practical layouts, good ventilation, and community-focused amenities. The locality is supported by nearby schools, hospitals, shopping areas, grocery markets, and daily-need services. With improving infrastructure, steady rental demand, and strong location advantage along the Dwarka Expressway, Sector 105 is emerging as a reliable choice for comfortable and long-term rental living in Gurugram.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Flats for Rent in Sector 105 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Clear and detailed answers to help tenants make informed rental decisions.

faqs.question: Is Sector 105 Gurugram a good area for renting a flat?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 105 is a developing and well-connected locality near Dwarka Expressway, making it suitable for long-term rental living.

faqs.question: What types of flats are available for rent in Sector 105?
faqs.answer: Tenants can find society apartments and builder floor flats in furnished, semi-furnished, and unfurnished options.

faqs.question: Is Sector 105 suitable for families?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area offers a peaceful environment with access to schools, hospitals, and daily convenience facilities.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 105 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Sector 105 enjoys excellent connectivity via Dwarka Expressway and nearby Delhi road networks.

faqs.question: Are rental flats in Sector 105 affordable?
faqs.answer: Compared to central Gurugram sectors, Sector 105 offers competitive rental pricing with good location advantages.

faqs.question: Are furnished flats available in Sector 105?
faqs.answer: Yes, furnished and semi-furnished flats are available depending on the project and landlord preference.

faqs.question: Is parking available with rental flats?
faqs.answer: Most residential societies and builder floors offer dedicated or shared parking facilities.

faqs.question: Do professionals working in Delhi prefer Sector 105?
faqs.answer: Yes, professionals working in Delhi prefer Sector 105 due to its proximity to the border and expressway connectivity.

faqs.question: Does Deal Acres provide verified rental listings?
faqs.answer: Yes, all listings on Deal Acres are verified to ensure authenticity and tenant trust.
